attributes.action: Test, Test, Test for Corona virus / Covid 19
attributes.additional_details:
Test, Test, Test is the advice from the World Health Organisation. Up to now the UK has not followed this advice and we have our Prime Minister Ill with Covid 19. 
We need to find the asymptomatic people in society that is spreading the disease Now 
Not in months time.
attributes.background: Covid 19 / Corona virus testing of all people in the UK. It is vitally important to find the super-spreaders in society. I know social distancing is helping but the asymptomatic super-spreaders are spreading the disease in hospitals and supermarkets. The super-spreaders don’t even know who that are.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
Find out more and watch the Committee put questions suggested by petitioners to Government Ministers and the Deputy Chief Medical Officer: 

https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/news/145767/committee-question-deputy-chief-medical-officer-and-ministers-on-coronavirus-response/

Read letters asking further questions of Government Ministers:

https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/publications/3/correspondence/
